title: How to use Microprofile Health Checks for your Services
content: Health checks are an essential component of all microservices applications. In this tutorial we will learn how to use the HealthCheck Microprofile API to verify the liveness and readiness of a Microservice along with the new Startup check which is available since the MP Health version 3.1.
